item.title: Jagex are a bunch of pricks
item.dc:creator: @Cheatest Cheatest
item.description:
@Cheatest wrote:

exactly thats what they said for my ban =\

Offence Type: Breaking Rule 5 Offence Date: 17 August 2006
Appeal Date: 17 August 2006 Close Date: 17 August 2006
Reason for appeal supplied at time of appeal:
Jagex i have recieved a 7 day ban i clicked this section because i dont feel i was Jagex staff imposing. really the only thing i said “quote"your gona get a 7 day bann for calling me a ni…”
He typed a racial slurr to me and i acted on that.

At the time i did not realise that i could get a bann or i would not of typed it.
As i read i still feel jagex imposing is "im jagex give me your passwo
Explanation of why appeal was denied:

Thank you for your appeal.

We are sorry to inform you that this appeal has been denied.

We have conclusive evidence that you were in control of the account at the time of the offence and for this reason this offence will remain on your account.

We suggest you take some time to remind yourself of the Rules of RuneScape before you start playing again!

RuneScape Customer Support

Sad thing is it was like 30 seconds after i sent the appeal so i think they have automated shit that sends the same message.

[scar]*********: omg go stand somewhere else
mr_greens: no im good here
*********: nub
mr_greens: lol
*********: little kid…
mr_greens: reported
*********: for what ? lal
mr_greens: asking if im a little kid
*********: didnt asked
mr_greens: looked like you asked to me…
mr_greens: your a *******
*********: ill report you for encouraging fine then
mr_greens: ******
mr_greens: …
mr_greens: your like michael jackson
mr_greens: asking for little kids
*********: nah me dun like nikkers
mr_greens: im black reported again
*********: whaha
mr_greens: dough report him
*********: you 2 r really sad
mr_greens: im actually happy
*********: go cry then
*********: what else r names for
mr_greens: dude you called me black and a ni…
*********: rofl
*********: wise guy a suppose
mr_greens: skull
mr_greens: i dont care
*********: dont cry then
mr_greens: your gona get a 7 day bann for calling me a ni…
*********: lmao sure
mr_greens: that cheers me up
*********: acting like a jagex mod to me
mr_greens: lol
mr_greens: he turns my frown upside down =)
mr_greens: * rly
mr_greens: skull skurred?
*********: done
mr_greens: lol he reported me
*********: no really?
mr_greens: may i ask what for?
*********: jagex impersonation
*********: you cant say that other will be banned
mr_greens: looks like staff impersonation to me
mr_greens: your telling me what i cant say
*********: yup
mr_greens: reported
*********: lol ?
mr_greens: you just told me what i cant say.
mr_greens: staff impersonation
*********: you r coming up with new rules?
mr_greens: so are you
*********: not really…
mr_greens: since when cant i say your going to get a 7 day bann
mr_greens: for calling me a ni…
*********: you cant let me get a ban or ban me…
*********: so why should you even talk about ban
mr_greens: you know everything dont you
mr_greens: sounds like a staff member to me
mr_greens: dough
*********: nah
mr_greens: you hear this
mr_greens: jagex staff member!
*********: just trying to be a good person
mr_greens: come talk to jagex staff over here skull king43!
mr_greens: o wait
mr_greens: no gold crown?[/scar]

Read full topic
